tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PlayerTransferHistory(
    player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    player_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    from_team VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    to_team VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    transfer_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE player_transfer_history (
  player_id INT,
  from_team_id INT,
  to_team_id INT,
  transfer_date DATE,
  transfer_fee DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE trade_records (
  trade_id INT,
  player_id INT,
  from_team_id INT,
  to_team_id INT,
  trade_date DATE,
  trade_value DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE TradeRecords (
 trade_id INT,
 player_id INT,
 from_team VARCHAR,
 to_team VARCHAR,
 trade_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE TradeRecords (
  trade_id INT,
  player_id INT,
  from_team_id INT,
  to_team_id INT,
  trade_date DATE
);
